author: tomj
msg: Since SOAP 1.1 requires SOAPAction, send an empty one if we don't have one.

author: tomj
msg: If their is no SOAPAction specified in the request, do not create one.
Since SOAP 1.2 is depricating SOAPAction, we shouldn't just make one up.

author: gdaniels
msg: Switch over to "allowedMethods" as the common method parameter
name.  This simplified some of the code in JavaProvider/EJBProvider.
We still support "methodName" for backwards compatibility.
Next change will update all wsdds.

author: butek
msg: Updated the address book sample readme.
